name: Charcot
description:
A journey in Charcot hospital.

Made during an art residence (P.A.S.T.E.C) in a psychiatric hospital.

Game by Robin Moretti & Juliano Gil

Robin - design, code, art & modeling (@RobinMoretti)

Juliano Gil - music (facebook)

Controls

Choose any key and never change it.

Robin Moretti 2017
